constantValues: A syndicate represents the information related to a commercial loan product that the customer holds with the bank. The syndicate will reference a specific loan, the contribution percentage, the amount and the specific bank that holds the syndicate.

definitions.description: A syndicate represents the information related to a commercial loan product that the customer holds with the bank. The syndicate will reference a specific loan, the contribution percentage, the amount and the specific bank that holds the syndicate.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the entity with respect to the base currency.

members.description: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the entity with respect to the base currency.

members.name: amount

constantValues: The amount contributed by the syndicate towards the client’s loan.

members.description: The amount contributed by the syndicate towards the client’s loan.

members.name: amountBase

constantValues: Value of the Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Amount in base currency.

members.name: contribution

constantValues: Percentage of the contribution of the syndicate.

members.description: Percentage of the contribution of the syndicate.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: loanId

constantValues: Reference to the loan product for which the syndicates are defined.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Reference to the loan product for which the syndicates are defined.

members.name: name

constantValues: The name of the custom entity.

members.description: The name of the custom entity.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'Syndicates' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: stateCode_display

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

members.name: statusCode

constantValues: Reason for the status of the Syndicates

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statusCode_display' is added to the 'Syndicates' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statusCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: statusCode_display

members.description: Reason for the status of the Syndicates

foreignKeyAttribute.name: transactionCurrencyId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the currency associated with the entity.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the currency associated with the entity.
